warningsAndPrecautions: fludrocortisone acetate tablets usp , 0.1 mg – white off-white , round , convex tablet debossed `` 7033 `` one side bisect side . unit dose packages 50 ( 5 x 10 ) ndc 68084-288-65 unit dose packages 100 ( 10 x 10 ) ndc 68084-288-01

name: Fludrocortisone Acetate
indications_original: Fludrocortisone acetate tablets, 0.1 mg are indicated as partial replacement therapy for primary and secondary adrenocortical insufficiency in Addison's disease and for the treatment of salt-losing adrenogenital syndrome.
contraindications_original:
Dosage depends on the severity of the disease and the response of the patient. Patients should be continually monitored for signs that indicate dosage adjustment is necessary, such as remission or exacerbations of the disease and stress (surgery, infection, trauma) (see 
  
                        WARNINGS
                     
                     and 
  
                        PRECAUTIONS, General
                     ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Fludrocortisone Acetate Tablets USP, 
  0.1 mg – Each white to off-white, round, convex tablet debossed with a "7033" on one side and with a bisect on the other side.
  
Unit dose packages of 50 (5 x 10) NDC 68084-288-65
  
Unit dose packages of 100 (10 x 10) NDC 68084-288-01
adverseReactions_original: Corticosteroids are contraindicated in patients with systemic fungal infections and in those with a history of possible or known hypersensitivity to these agents.
